headline: Pirro goes off on ‘four years of hell’ Americans went through over Russia: ‘It all comes back to Hillary!’
author: Kevin Haggerty
sentences:
President Donald J. Trump:
"The latest pleading from Special Counsel Robert Durham provides indisputable evidence that my campaign and presidency were spied on by operatives paid by the Hillary Clinton Campaign in an effort to develop a completely fabricated connection… pic.twitter.com/jaERtmhDER
— Liz Harrington (@realLizUSA) February 12, 2022
“This is a scandal far greater in scope and magnitude than Watergate and those who were involved in and knew about this spying operation should be subject to criminal prosecution,” Trump’s statement reads in part.

Pirro, retired judge and co-host of “The Five,” joined Martha MacCallum on “The Story” to go over the details of special counsel John Durham’s court filing from Friday and the insights it provides on the so-called “conspiracy.”
The filing asserts a conflict of interest caused stemming from Clinton attorney Michael Sussmann who is said to have been feeding false claims to the FBI about connections between Trump and Russia.

“It all comes back to Hillary Clinton, the people who worked on her campaign, the funding that went through her campaign that paid for these individuals.”
MacCallum recounted that the door was left open for these findings to come out through actions taken by former Attorney General Bill Barr when he named John Durham special counsel near the end of the Trump Administration.

“In a stronger period of time in our country, this crime would have been punishable by death.”
Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) voiced his support for Trump’s statement during an interview with “Fox & Friends” where he said, “We’ve never seen anything like this in history.

Sussmann’s information came from a South African Clinton activist named Rodney Joffe who was utilizing a Pentagon contract to collect data from then-candidate and President Trump’s calls and text, including those from the Executive Office of the President.

Trump is a crime victim https://t.co/X2vCGLVAeH
— Tom Fitton (@TomFitton) February 12, 2022
Correct, they enlisted hackers to plant fake evidence with the expressed intent of that fake evidence then becoming fake news/crimes.

You had families who didn’t speak to each other because Donald Trump was a Putin puppet.”
This conspiracy and the divisions it stoked throughout the nation,” is all at the behest of Hillary Clinton,” blamed Pirro.

This is truly unprecedented, truly something that has never happened in the history of our great country.”
The outrage over these findings spread over the weekend as many public figures voiced similar opinions.

I don’t know if I can say Hillary Clinton exactly, but it’s her campaign.”
After the details of the court filing came out, Trump issued a statement with some strong words for those behind spying.

(Source Fox News)
Fox News’ Jeanine Pirro blamed Hillary Clinton on Monday for dividing the country and dividing families with “four years of hell” over her narrative on Russian collusion.
“This is surveillance of servers to a Russian bank connected to Putin to make it look the president of the United States is a Putin puppet and a Russian asset,” Pirro said of the filing.

Who do you think was behind all of this?”
“Well obviously,” Pirro answered without hesitation, “it’s the Clinton campaign and Hillary Clinton.

— Steve Scalise (@SteveScalise) February 12, 2022
They spied on Trump during the campaign, and they spied on him as President.
You’re gonna do that because somebody has instructed him to do that.” MacCallum stated before asking, “Who is that somebody?

https://t.co/6djYYiLT4Y
— Steve Deace (@SteveDeaceShow) February 14, 2022

Obama knew.
“Think about it, Martha,” Pirro opined, “what they did to this country for four years.
Shocking new details coming from Durham: They spied on Trump WHILE he was President.
The findings prompted MacCallum to question Pirro on Sussman’s motivations.
So President Trump’s statement yesterday, I think is right on target.
If they can do this to a president, imagine what they can do to you.
They all knew Trump was innocent but they smeared and spied on him.
Strzok knew.Clapper knew.Schiff knew.FBI knew.DOJ knew.
The public will not see it and we do not share it.
“He wouldn’t do that on his own, right?
Worst scandal in nation's history.
They all need to go to prison.
In other words, high treason.
CIA knew.State knew.
Brennan knew.
Clinton knew.
McCabe knew.
Biden knew.
Comey knew.
Scary.
NEW!
